review: I use Postmates at least once a week on average and subscribe and ALWAYS tip drivers 20% plus and usually add Cash too just cause I know how hard this world is! But IM still very upset that about a month ago I ordered a pizza when I was out of town ( I have my location setting set to while using app because I don‚Äôt see the purpose of a delivery app knowing my exact location every minute of every day) when I got home LATE and exhausted from traveling I ordered supper and it was sent to a popular chain but in my previous location, I immediately received a notification that I was FAR from the delivery address and I canceled the order ( but was still billed) then reordered the exact same order from correct location and it was also Canceled!!!   Both show canceled on my account but I was still charged for the first accidental order AND had to cook supper at 8-9pm after traveling ALL DAY! So, NOT happy about that! I feel like im a fair customer and try my best to be honest and fair to my clients this is something that I am very unhappy about having to pay an extra almost $83 this month on my credit card for a order that was canceled within minutes of placing the order!
userName: Busy mom of 3 or is it 4
title: Usually great

review:
Tried using Postmates for the first time and after searching/selecting and then submitting an order, it kicked back saying ‚Äúno drivers available‚Äù. I think okay, fine I‚Äôll see if other closer restaurants will work‚Ä¶ I find a local restaurant and place the order. It arrives in a semi-reasonable time frame. Come to find out it‚Äôs missing items from my order that I paid for. I contact Help, who are absolutely beyond useless. They just provide canned answers stating ‚Äúthis order is not eligible for any refund or adjustment, but we will use this info to better our service in the future‚Äù. I‚Äôm sorry, what? I have used other services (DoorDash, etc) who immediately rectify and take accountability for issues using their service. I even escalated it to a supervisor who literally just copy/pasted the same answer with no help. They also keep closing it out as ‚Äòresolved‚Äô when it‚Äôs not. I‚Äôm super frustrated and I will absolutely never use this service again after this being my first experience. 

Like I said, stick to the other companies that know what they are doing.
title: Support is horrendous, stick to other companies

review:
A few nights ago I placed an order on Postmates. It was late (1:30 am) and not a lot of places were open near me. I had to work early in the morning (7 am) and needed to go to bed but I was hungry and hadn‚Äôt eaten since lunch (1 pm) the previous day. It said my food would arrive at 2:05am with priority delivery. For whatever reason the arrival time got pushed back to 2:30am and my order was ready for pickup around 2:15. On the map I watched my delivery driver circle the building and park about a block away from the restaurant. Then all of a sudden they cancelled my order after waiting over an hour and I had to start the process again eventually getting a delivery from a place I didn‚Äôt want over 2 hours from the time I placed my original order. At least when you go to the ER they let you know that it‚Äôs gonna take awhile before providing you with absolutely nothing that makes you feel any better. 

Also Postmates will charge you more than the total it gives you when you place the order with absolutely no explanation of the additional cost ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
title: Worse than going to the ER

review: I downloaded this app signed up put credit card, debit card, Apple Pay and $130 Uber cash on my account. Now when I try to use my Uber cash even with my card there is an error. I let Postmates know this in the beginning of October and they have done nothing but repeatedly sent me the same message without reading what the actual complaint was which is they have $110 of mine that I cannot spend. I live in California (expensive), I‚Äôm  pregnant with an entire family and $110 is a lot of money which I was trying to feed my family with and Postmates will not give it back nor fix the app. We are in a recession and this company will not even respond to me anymore when I ask them for legal information so I can‚Äôt even attempt to get my money back. Now I will be taking this to social media, the actual media and everywhere else until I get my money back or they fix the app. This is unacceptable and that is the last of my money since I have been on leave for disability and I want it back or I wanna be able to provide food for my family.
title: Will 100% still your money

review:
Their fees are outrageous.
Not only do they ALREADY up their prices on every item from businesses to profit from, but they also charge you all these ‚Äúfees‚Äù. If I place an order and the order comes out to $11, the total with the FEES will come out to $20. How is that even fair? You‚Äôre better off just driving to whatever food place yourself. Not to mention, when you order through the app, the restaurant/place almost ALWAYS messes up your order somehow and you only get a partial refund depending on what happened and left with a messed up order still. 
Their customer support team via phone has always been delightful which is why I‚Äôm giving two stars, but without them, it‚Äôd be a one star. 
OH, and for some reason, when you order through the app, it won‚Äôt show all the item the restaurants sell. I even called restaurants and asked why it‚Äôs not on there and they have no idea..
title: Insane

review: If I could rate the Postmates service a negative star I would.  The app itself is fine, but the service is horrendous.  On multiple occasions our delivery was missing items from our order.  After reporting the issue, Postmates would issue an apology but not provide a refund for the missing items.  We used to be able to get them to issue a refund after some arguing with customer service, but now they are saying we have had too many issues in the past and they won‚Äôt refund for order issues anymore.  I find it hard to understand why it is our fault for their delivery failures and why we should have to pay for items we never received.  I hope sometime slaps them with a class action lawsuit because that is the only way they will learn that unfairly ripping off their customers and providing zero customer service is a bad business strategy.
title: Horrible customer service

review: Postmates is the fastest way to go broke ordering delivery. We have been customers for a long time now and we pay the yearly ‚ÄúUnlimited‚Äù service fee in an attempt to make the experience more palatable to our wallet. Even when ordering from a place with ‚Äúfree delivery‚Äù and having an unlimited membership, there are still a ton of extra fees. Restaurants also get paid 30% less when people use Postmates to order so the restaurants also jack up their prices to cover their losses. Who pays for all of this? You/us! If you ever have a problem with your order, don‚Äôt expect any help from customer service. They use an automated service first, then pass you off to someone over seas that copy/pastes boiler-plate responses. Use another food service company..any other company, actually. This is by far the worst. We are done and have deleted the app, once and for all.
title: The worst food service company‚Ä¶steer clear

review:
I made an order for a pretty large group of people at work. After multiple delays the delivery personally finally showed up at the drop off location, marked my order ‚ÄúDelivered‚Äù, and left. Shortly after she messaged me saying that she didn‚Äôt bring the food because the restaurant cancelled the order. 

I sent this to Postmates support along with screenshots of the message from the delivery person herself saying that she never got the food. After a lot of back and forth they said they were sorry but because the delivery driver showed up at the delivery location, they were unable to give me a refund. 

I paid for food not for someone to show up at the drop off location empty handed. This is after spending thousands on large orders through the app. Very disappointed with this level of service, and I won‚Äôt be using this app again.
title: Terrible support, scammers

review:
Before the other night I had placed a total of 3 orders ever on this app. One of the orders I had ended with me receiving an order missing items. I contacted customer service and they fixed it. Fine. But then I placed an order last Friday and once again my order was missing food. I was told that nothing could be done for me as I had already had a partial refund in the past. Excuse me? So now that I have another bad order you decide to completely alienate me from ever using the app again by telling me you won‚Äôt help? And to top it off, you told me to go review the driver as a way of alerting you to my bad experience? So you want the driver to take the blame? 

I am deleting the app, reporting you to BBB, and opening a PayPal dispute since you think you can take my money and not provide me the food I ordered. Never again.
title: Terrible customer service- never again.

review: this app is crazy with the taxing. for example it says my total is around 15$ and then when I pay it‚Äôs like 23$ dollars. it also charges a delivery fee when I pay monthly for better deals.  makes no sense. not to mention the fact that you can deliver from some places but then when you try to pick up from that place it isn‚Äôt available ( btw picking up is cheaper so ofc they do that üôÑ) but it makes no sense that a driver can pick it up but you can‚Äôt. also I have ordered from a place only to have the driver text me and say it was closed. as well as have a driver pick up my food and never show up, he stayed in a parking lot I could see it on the maps. plus they ALWAYS forget items. recently I ordered subway and got a sandwich drink and cookie, bro forgot the cookie and drink ‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs like the whole order smh ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

review: I don‚Äôt know how Postmates stays in business, never had experiences so bad as using this app. Not only did the delivery person deliver to the wrong address, they left the food outside during heat wave by the parking lot next to the call box and made no attempt to call me. title: Postmates is consistently terrible

review:
Oh, yeah. Shouty caps bad. 

Back when Postmates was Postmates and not Uber Eats masquerading as Postmates, it was great. Ever since it changed hands it‚Äôs been a nightmare. 

The communication is basically zero. I waited for hours thinking my order was still coming. Only to find out (after climbing through a labyrinth on their app) there‚Äôs no one around to deliver it. 

How about just say so? Just friggin tell me that when I place the order, so my kids and I aren‚Äôt waiting for breakfasts that just aren‚Äôt coming. I‚Äôm wheelchair-bound and can‚Äôt just get up and go fetch food on the fly. It would be nice to be informed. 

But cha won‚Äôt. These folks don‚Äôt believe in going, ‚ÄúHey there! Your food can‚Äôt be delivered. There‚Äôs just no one around to go get your order. Sorry. ü§∑üèº‚Äù 

Maybe try Doordash. Or opt for calling the restaurant directly. Just stay away from the Uber‚Äôs attempt at food delivery.

title: My go to

review: If you feel dropping food off wherever and still being guaranteed pay and tips, join Postmates. If you feel like keeping the goods of others and don‚Äôt care if waiting with a torn ACL and are dependent on delivery for survival, Postmates. Don‚Äôt worry about reprisal. The customer has no recourse through the app or website. Postmates closed the call center and even shutdown their help center email. They don‚Äôt even have an automated message in the help center. Free money, free food, and free valuables, guaranteed. Thanks Postmates
title: If your a thief or a moron, Postmates will hire you

review: Usually when you order your meal it‚Äôs comes to around $12 to $17 but then including the delivery fee you‚Äôll be paying the same amount or even more! I love the app for its UI and the freedom of being able to reorder my meals and how easily accessible it is to all. Just hope that they can do something about the delivery fees. :(
title: Great but Costly

review: Postmates used to be my favorite delivery app, but I recently learned that each menu item is priced higher then it would be at the restaurant. Why do they need to do that when they already charge so much an extra fees! I feel completely scammed, and it explains why they give away promos so often. Even with the promo, it‚Äôs more expensive to order it on the app and it would be to get it delivered from the actual restaurant which I just learned so I will be doing that from now on.
title: Just another greedy app

review: I‚Äôve been ordering for Postmates for over two years. It really carried me through my pregnancy and the pandemic and they continue to have great service amazing drivers/carriers and I will continue to patronize them over other food delivery services and platforms.
title: Has carried me through

review: Have used all the delivery apps and Postmates for whatever reason just seems to deliver consistently a better product regardless of where I order. I‚Äôll sometime see a restaurant on Uber Eats and the specifically go to Postmates so it arrives fresh, with utensils, sauces etc‚Ä¶great service worth the moola
title: Fresh, Delicious Every time

review: Got postmates because they advertised a $10 off deal on my first order, however the deal was never applied to my order. I spent several days trying to contact customer service but kept hitting a wall. Horrible customer support, and I feel misled by their advertising. Will be using other food delivery services from now on.
title: Horrible customer service

review: I paid for unlimited for months and my husband who doesn‚Äôt have unlimited would add the same things to our basket and mine was always $20 more at any restaurant‚Ä¶. The restaurants charge your more for the same items if you have unlimited- for example adding rice cost me with unlimited $3.50 and my husband without unlimited $2.50.. overall my cart total would always be higher, taxes would be higher and I would overpay on top of paying them monthly.. complete SCAM and ripoff
title: Unlimited is a SCAM

review: Postmate and Uber is jsut a terrible app and company in general. 1. They will change your delivery time after you place your order, for example, you will see the delivery time to be 20min, and when you go check your delivery status 20 minutes later, they will say that the estimated delivery time changed to 40 minutes. 2. Their customer service is terrible and never answers your issue. They will end the chat before solving the problem.
title: Terrible customer service

review: same old complaints: exorbitant delivery fees, inability to make customizations or add sauces etc, impossible to get orders fixed right then when there are errors, you can only get a refund or order the whole thing again. too impersonal and hard to get ahold of anyone that does take accountability. BUT, i keep coming back for the convenience and at least they tend to be quick with refunds. ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø
title: convenience.. but at what cost?

review: It was hard to add what payment I wanted onto my order. Maybe if there was a done button on the payment page it would have made more sense than going back and forth. Also there needs to be a way to edit or delete a payment.
title: Payment glitchy

review: My first and only order was all screwed up and then delayed to the point that the first driver left. That‚Äôs on the vendor but the app is really limited in their accountability with how they communicate and resolve problems. You end up calling the vendor and hearing one side and Postmates just wants to cancel and refund. What a waste of my and I‚Äôm sure the drivers time. I‚Äôll only order from places that have their own delivery service.
title: No accountability

review:
Too many times I haven‚Äôt had my food or things delivered and nothing arrives, then you can‚Äôt get a hold of anyone who‚Äôs actually human for support. The refund they issue is just to use again and twice I‚Äôve had the same thing refunded (not the item) I ordered a $28 total one night at 8 pm never received it.

The refund came back the next day I used $25 since I already had it to get Postmates from somewhere else..
Same issue 

The last straw for me was when I placed an order. They said it was on the way.. kept saying it an hour later ‚Äúlooking for another driver‚Äù
They found it 20 mins later ‚Äúon the way‚Äù and then 1 hour goes by ‚Äúlooking for another driver‚Äù
I couldn‚Äôt cancel the order I forget the issue
I drove there myself and picked it up

review: The fees on here are crazy wen you go ready them and what they are they charge us for the driver to get benefits instead of the company providing them and the service fee is for helps cover cost related to the order but what cost will there be üòÇüòÇü§® I mean I‚Äôve literally had a drive tell me a restaurant wouldn‚Äôt give them my straw cause I didn‚Äôt request it but got a drink and wouldn‚Äôt give him one yet I paid a service fee so u would think that would‚Äôve covered it if I had to pay

review:

very fresh they have very good food here I

title: Postmates if fine, but it‚Äôs not this

I tried emailing, texting, calling and chatting through the app to fix this error and get a refund on my food that I never received, and after an hour I still have not been refunded. There is no customer service please fix this immediately.

review: This customer service is horrible. Instead of just refunding every time an order is wrong why not get to the root of the problem and try to fix getting the order wrong in the first place? title: Postmates!

review:

I will reiterate, USE A COMPETITOR to deliver you food in a safe and timely manner!
Location: major metropolitan city in the southwest.
title: Terrible service, unable to locate a driver

review: Postmates definitely has cheaper prices when it comes to other apps such as UberEats or DoorDash, but the quality of the service is horrendous.
